thread.title: Former Liverpool striker Robbie Fowler shows off bruises after crashing out of reality programme The Jump
thread.title_full: Former Liverpool striker Robbie Fowler shows off bruises after crashing out of reality programme The Jump

author: Aaron Flanagan
title: Former Liverpool striker Robbie Fowler shows off bruises after crashing out of reality programme The Jump
text:
Sport Former Liverpool striker Robbie Fowler shows off bruises after crashing out of reality programme The Jump Fowler was the third celebrity to be eliminated from the reality TV programme after his high speed crash Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Robbie Fowler suffers bad crash on Channel 4's The Jump Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Robbie Fowler has been left nursing nasty bruises after crashing out of reality TV programme The Jump. 
The Liverpool legend was the third contestant to be eliminated after a fall which left his left forearm showing the damage. 
Taking to Twitter after the fall, Fowler shared an image of his battle wounds and insisted to his followers: "Don't hit skeleton walls". 
Fowler lost balance and tumbled to the ground during the competition on the Channel 4 reality show. Fowler fell while competing on The Jump (Photo: Supplied by WENN) He lost his balance after landing (Photo: Supplied by WENN) 
The 41-year-old's right leg gave way upon landing of his effort, sending him painfully crashing to the deck. 
As Fowler fell, he put his arms out to protect himself in his landing, but only succeeded in sending himself collapsing into a dramatic heap. Fowler was sent tumbling into the ground (Photo: Supplied by WENN) He picked up some nasty bruises for his troubles (Photo: Supplied by WENN) 
"I have absolutely loved this, it's been a wonderful experience," said Fowler, who now works as an ambassador for Liverpool. 
"I wish I'd stayed a bit longer but look these guys are all fantastic and you know what they're all much better than me so they all deserve to be here." Like us on Facebook
